categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Nim Drovis Civil War was fought between the two major tribes on Nim Drovis, the Drovians and the Gopso'o. The exact origins of the war were lost over time, although some believed it started as a dispute over the grammatical construction of the Drovian word for "truth": one side believed it was singular, and the other plural.
